RumorFact.Text: Solanum wants to check the time loop control panel. I might find her inside the Ash Twin Project.

ExploreFact.Text: Solanum is already here and is observing the time loop ring's logs.

Solanum just realized I'm in the time loop and that our Sun will supernova soon. Using the charged warp core, we might be able to escape the supernova. Seems like we will meet again inside the Vessel.
Solanum just happened to pass right by the unlinked statue inside the Ash Twin Project. Now she's stuck in the time loop too.
